Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,4).
formula: G.f.: (-1+x)/(-1+x+4*x^2)Recurrence: {a(1)=0, a(0)=1, 4*a(n)+a(n+1)-a(n+2)=0}Sum(1/17*(-1+9*_alpha)*_alpha^(-1-n), _alpha=RootOf(-1+_Z+4*_Z^2))If p[1]=0, and p[i]=4, ( i>1), and if A is Hessenberg matrix of order n defined by: A[i,j]=p[j-i+1], (i<=j), A[i,j]=-1, (i=j+1), and A[i,j]=0 otherwise. Then, for n>=1, a(n)=det A. [From _Milan Janjic_, Apr 29 2010]
